title: Carla Hall on Biscuits, Mom’s Meatloaf, and Her Grandmother’s Cast-Iron Skillet
description:
Chef Carla Hall talks about southern roots and global influences with host Martie Duncan. On this episode of Homemade, Hall tells about making biscuits with strangers, riffs on meatloaf-inspired Vietnamese lettuce wraps, and reminisces on discovering cooking while modeling in Europe. She also shares her method for cooking perfect greens.
